( CNN ) -- In a confidential letter to special counsel Robert Mueller in January , President Donald Trump 's legal team acknowledged for the first time that [ARG0: Trump] " [V: dictated] " [ARG1: the first misleading statement put out about his son 's controversial 2016 meeting with Russians at Trump Tower] .

( CNN ) -- In a confidential letter to special counsel Robert Mueller in January , President Donald Trump 's legal team acknowledged for the first time that Trump " dictated " [ARG1: the first misleading statement] [V: put] [ARGM-DIR: out] [ARGM-ADV: about his son 's controversial 2016 meeting with Russians at Trump Tower] .
